question: Who among the following are “people of yellow complexion, oblique eyes, high cheek bones, sparse hair and medium height.”?
explanation: Mongoloids are inhabitants of northern, eastern and south-east Asia.  Their eyes have a characteristic fold of skin on the upper lid, hair is lank and straight and the height is medium. The group also includes the Chinese, Japanese, Burmese, Thais, Vietnamese and Malays.
